Designing a landing page test

May 2022

Building products that resonate with the user is the holy-grail of the start-up world and a landing page test is a popular way of testing an idea. But how does one increase the chances of a successful test?

Discovering what to build — lessons learnt

Apr 2022

Product discovery is an iterative, experimental and subjective process, with the chances of boiling the ocean and having to pivot many times over being high. Regardless of what I’d read before, finding compelling products to build in the EdTech space was an illuminating experience.
